actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to require the Administrator of Veteran's Affairs to establish a national cemetery at Valley Forge, Pa.

summary.text: Directs the Administrator of Veterans' Affairs to establish a national cemetery at Valley Forge, Pennsylvania, but not within the specified tract of land now known as Valley Forge State Park. Authorizes the appropriation of sums necessary to carry out this Act.

titles.title: A bill to require the Administrator of Veteran's Affairs to establish a national cemetery at Valley Forge, Pa.
